channel.title: Strange error help plz
channel.description:
[code]Buildfile: C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Desktop\Server&client\Server\ build.xml
runls: [java] Login Server starting up... [java] Connected to MySQL [java] Exception in thread "main" com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.Conve rsionException: Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.ls.packethandler.PacketHandlerDef as it does not have a no-args constructor [java] ---- Debugging information ---- [java] message : Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.ls.packethandle r.PacketHandlerDef as it does not have a no-args constructor [java] line number : 2 [java] path : /PacketHandler-array/PacketHandler [java] cause-message : Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.ls.packethandle r.PacketHandlerDef as it does not have a no-args constructor [java] class : [Lorg.rscdaemon.ls.packethandler.PacketHandler Def; [java] cause-exception : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection .ObjectAccessException [java] required-type : org.rscdaemon.ls.packethandler.PacketHandlerDe f [java] ------------------------------- [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother (TreeUnmarshaller.java:45) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.co nvertAnother(ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.java:39) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.AbstractColle ctionConverter.readItem(AbstractCollectionConverter.java:82) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.ArrayConverte r.unmarshal(ArrayConverter.java:51) [java] at nvertAnother(ReferenceByXPathUnmarshaller.java:39) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.start(TreeUnma rshaller.java:99) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.ReferenceByXPathMarshallingStra tegy.unmarshal(ReferenceByXPathMarshallingStrategy.java:12) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.unmarshal(XStream.java:552) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.unmarshal(XStream.java:540) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.fromXML(XStream.java:497) [java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.util.PersistenceManager.load(PersistenceMana ger.java:43) [java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.LoginEngine.loadPacketHandlers(LoginEngine.j ava:87) [java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.LoginEngine.<init>(LoginEngine.java:48) [java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.Server.<init>(Server.java:53) [java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.Server.getServer(Server.java:46) [java] at org.rscdaemon.ls.Server.main(Server.java:192) [java] Caused by: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAcce ssException: Cannot construct org.rscdaemon.ls.packethandler.PacketHandlerDef as it does not have a no-args constructor [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.PureJavaReflec tionProvider.newInstance(PureJavaReflectionProvider.java:50) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ReflectionConv erter.instantiateNewInstance(ReflectionConverter.java:148) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ReflectionConv erter.unmarshal(ReflectionConverter.java:90) [java] at com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarshaller.convertAnother (TreeUnmarshaller.java:38) [java] ... 16 more [java] Java Result: 1
BUILD SUCCESSFUL Total time: 2 seconds Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Strange error help plz
item.dc:creator: @Kapitein_Bier Kapitein Bier
item.description:
@Kapitein_Bier wrote:

You will need JDK 6 instead of 7

Read full topic
